en: We built an event website for HP, creating dedicated pages for various events to enhance engagement and customer experience. Each event had its own tailored page with introductions and detailed information. The site featured a modern and clean design, ensuring visitors could easily browse and find what they needed.
zh: 我們為 HP 建立了一個活動網站，為各類活動設置獨立頁面，旨在提升活動的參與度和客戶體驗。每個活動都有專屬頁面，根據具體活動的細節和需求進行內容調整，提供活動介紹及詳細資料。
網站整體採用了現代且簡潔的設計風格，確保訪客能毫不費力地瀏覽和查找信息。
